name: data-manager
description: A tool to help manage the data in the digital land platform

scripts.copy:assets: mkdir -p application/static/govuk/assets/fonts application/static/javascripts/govuk application/static/stylesheets && cp -r node_modules/govuk-frontend/dist/govuk/assets/fonts/* application/static/govuk/assets/fonts/ && cp src/javascripts/map.js application/static/javascripts/ && cp node_modules/digital-land-frontend/digital-land-frontend/javascripts/digital-land-cookies.js application/static/javascripts/  && cp node_modules/accessible-autocomplete/dist/accessible-autocomplete.min.js application/static/javascripts/ && cp node_modules/accessible-autocomplete/dist/accessible-autocomplete.min.css application/static/stylesheets/ && cp node_modules/govuk-frontend/dist/govuk/all.bundle.js application/static/javascripts/govuk/govuk-frontend.js && cp node_modules/digital-land-frontend/digital-land-frontend/javascripts/digital-land-frontend.js application/static/javascripts/
scripts.postinstall: npm run nps copy.javascripts && npm run nps build.stylesheets && npm run nps build.javascripts && npm run copy
